document_data.mainbody:
hkkch was the daughter of Ma Festina and an inhabitant of the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Like her mother, Chkkch was a human girl with a light skin tone. But unlike Ma, she had dark red hair, and her eyes were blue.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, Festina brought her daughter to a performance of some showy magics by three spellslingers, on the Murls Rest plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. The mother was delighted by her daughters joy seeing the magical show. It was the most fun the girl had since her birthday.
